channel.title: Makes you think
channel.description:
Now, here is a warning, this guy is on acid, lsd, pot, cocaine, and basically every other thing that messed with his mind, BUT a few things make you think. Enjoy.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KQgpIC8y_iU[/youtube]

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

rip4d:

How am I “way off” if I’m not even assuming what time is?

organized beings exist.

earth rotates.

time.

redundant philosophies.

Read full topic

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:30, topic:435279”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=537998.msg3935295#msg3935295 date=1331003100]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=537998.msg3935289#msg3935289 date=1331003015]

[quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=537998.msg3935284#msg3935284 date=1331002971]

OH MY GOD THERE ARE SQUARES CHANGING SHAPE TOO!!!

Its the Illuminati wanting to stab your buttholes guys run for your lives.

no it’s all a pyramid.

[/quote]

Theres fucking squares.

Rip, don’t get so mad.
[/quote]I’m not mad, I just enjoy being a dumbass sometimes.

reread what I said, there’s obviously squares there a mind trick illusion that forms the pyramid.
[/quote]Yeah. Anything beyond the 3rd dimension is incredibly difficult to wrap your head around. Try thinking of the concept of time for instance. You can’t see, hear, taste, smell, or feel it, yet it somehow exists. What is it? Does it even exist? Is it simply a measurement of the universal movement of objects, or is it actually an existing entity, possibly even a dimension?

Very confusing, yet I love it so much. <3 quantum physics.[/quote]

you’re way off, man

Read full topic

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:50, topic:435279”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=537998.msg3936769#msg3936769 date=1331090872]
Time travel is already possible regardless of any dimension.
[/quote]
Going again with Acorn_ on this, there is already research that at after speeds, life goes slower in that faster moving object. Like if a train were to go at near light speed around the earth, it would take about 1 week for it to travel 100 years into the future. Or the one that is little harder to explain, flying a space ship on the outer rim of a black hole would slow down time by 2 fold, kinda risky for the slow amount of time travel.

I think that the forth demotion would consist of beings that would know how to EASILY time travel, without all the paradoxes and risks. Maybe some higher evolved beings that are not dead or alive, just simply collected thoughts and knowledge.[/quote]
My thoughts exactly.

Read full topic

Going again with Acorn_ on this, there is already research that at after speeds, life goes slower in that faster moving object. Like if a train were to go at near light speed around the earth, it would take about 1 week for it to travel 100 years into the future. Or the one that is little harder to explain, flying a space ship on the outer rim of a black hole would slow down time by 2 fold, kinda risky for the slow amount of time travel.

I think that the forth demotion would consist of beings that would know how to EASILY time travel, without all the paradoxes and risks. Maybe some higher evolved beings that are not dead or alive, just simply collected thoughts and knowledge.

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:42, topic:435279”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=537998.msg3936481#msg3936481 date=1331082029]

That video got me thinking alot. So 2d cant move “above” or “up” or “below” or “down”. only verticle horizontal forward back left right etc. since we can, maybe the Fourth dimension can do more things then us, like i dont know, maybe time travel? Anyone understand what im getting at. I mean what other direction is there left to move? 3d pretty much covers it all am I right? At least all the directions 3d creatures can perceive.

I couldn’t have said it better.

Just say your playing a 2d game. Does it have depth? No. That would be impossible. But what we think is impossible may be very well possible in a 4th dimension.

I don’t understand how time travel got thrown into that??? Moving through time isn’t physically moving in a direction…
[/quote]

You don’t know that, and you never will. Like in the 2d world, moving above isn’t physically possible. In the 3d world, time travel isn’t physically possible, but above is. So maybe in the 4th dimmension, time travel is possible.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:39, topic:435279”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=537998.msg3934988#msg3934988 date=1330992903]

Too long; didn’t watch…

Anyone else or just me?

Could you summarise what happens past like, 2 minutes roughly, or what he even talks about…?

It’s to much to explain in a few paragraphs, it’s about different dimensions and him explaining how the third dimension and forth dimension are connected, what it might be like there, basically a lot of quantum stuff.

DMT

It’s not talking about Dimethyltryptamine, it’s talking about actual dimensions.
[/quote]

You will find that DMT is an extremely potent psychedelic.[/quote]
Too bad it only lasts 30 minutes at most on a regular dose.

Read full topic

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

rip4d:

Exactly, which is what make this topic so interesting. This is why I want to be a physicist; to figure out these problems and possibly apply them to modern day technology.

We share a common interesting, these things baffle me mentally, and make me want to learn more about them. Especially when they could change the way things are comprehended, maybe even tell us what happens after we die. Do we just stop there? Does our thoughts float around somewhere else? What do things look like in other dimension? So many questions to answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Makes you think
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Acorn_:

However because it’s just actually a 2d image projected in 3d it’s not actually 4d until proven otherwise as your theory suggests.

Even though Acorn_ has make this thread a conspiracy thread to build pyramids, I have to say he is right on that one. The image of a 4d image is only a prediction of what a possible 4d thing could look like. We could never create a 4d object, or even create scale of a 4d object in our universe as we would not be able to comprehend that object, we can only estimate. Just like in the 2d universe, you wouldn’t be able to show people a 3d object.

Read full topic
